text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC So you are headed to Jacksonville now. Another Covid-19 hot spot. You will not be satisfied until every American in this country is infected, huh? Stop these rallies and conventions. There is no need for them. You are the incumbent. Biden is the opponent. Let Americans Live!!
